programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: When a beloved member of a tight-knit community is killed, the town cries out for immediate justice; after a young man is sentenced to death for the crime, and an out-of-town lawyer argues they convicted an innocent man.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: The murder of a gender-nonconforming Black teenager remains unsolved despite pressure from family and friends - raising issues about the increase of violence, and the lack of justice for trans murder victims across the country.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: Years after the body of a young woman is found strangled to death in a creek bed, law enforcement finally closes the case; a closer look raises questions about the investigation.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: On a remote island, a dispute between two lobstermen is settled the way islanders do: face-to-face; the conflict turns deadly when one swings an ax - leaving locals to dispute whether the death was self-defense or murder.

programme.title: Ministry of Evil: The Twisted Cult of Tony Alamo
programme.desc: In the 1960s, preachers Tony and Susan Alamo recruit nomads to join their ministry; former members give insight into the cult's origins.

programme.title: Ministry of Evil: The Twisted Cult of Tony Alamo
programme.desc: Tony and Susan Alamo's grip on power is challenged as Susan becomes ill and law enforcement investigates allegations of labor violations and abuse.

programme.title: Ministry of Evil: The Twisted Cult of Tony Alamo
programme.desc: While on the run, Alamo orders those who remain loyal to him to leave the compound and take his wife's body with them while he tries to evade arrest.

programme.title: Ministry of Evil: The Twisted Cult of Tony Alamo
programme.desc: Out of prison, Tony Alamo begins to make young girls his "wives"; as the child abuse escalates, some ex-members urge the FBI to intervene.

programme.title: Jonestown: Terror in the Jungle
programme.desc: Sadistic preacher Jim Jones forms the Peoples Temple after an unusual childhood; the cult's members are captivated; Jones' lust for power becomes unstoppable.

programme.title: Stuck With You
programme.desc: Vaughn, Candace's sexy ex, comes to town and makes it clear he still has his eye on the prize, threatening Luvell in more than one way; Mora has her eye on a new crush; Quasir struggles with Katrina's big announcement.

programme.title: Jonestown: Terror in the Jungle
programme.desc: A heroic congressman travels to Jonestown; Temple members plot their escape; Jim Jones realizes the walls are closing in and plans his final stand.

programme.title: Jonestown: Terror in the Jungle
programme.desc: The world learns about the mass murder-suicide in Jonestown, orchestrated by cult leader Jim Jones; survivors try to piece their lives back together.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: It was a mystery that plagued law enforcement for over years: four unidentified bodies found inside barrels in the woods; one woman searching for answers from her own troubled past sets herself on a journey to give the victims back their names.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man whose childhood was marked by tragedy learns of a relatively unknown serial killer, and finds himself thinking about unidentified victims; it isn't long before that pursuit becomes a full-time job and identifying victims an obsession.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young mother is found unresponsive in bed, and her cause of death is determined to be an accidental heroin overdose; but her family questions everything about the circumstances around her death, so they launch their own investigation.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man leaves home for the corner store, but dies on a rainy sidewalk just down the street; bystanders claim that he fell off of his bike, but his mom and sister don't buy it; they hit the streets to find answers.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young girl's life was thrown into chaos when her single mother died by a gunshot wound in their remote mountain home; the journey for the truth would be long and arduous, and it would be thirty years until justice was finally served.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: When a college student was found dead in rural Quebec, police refused to call it a murder; but years later, her brother continues his own investigation into her death; on the eve of a trip to return to the scene of the crime, tragedy strikes again.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: Charles "Lucky" Luciano teams up with Meyer Lansky and Bugsy Siegel in New York, and during prohibition, he makes a fortune.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: Charles "Lucky" Luciano gains power in the New York underworld during prohibition; when two bosses start a mob war, Luciano plans to kill them both.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: "Lucky" Luciano takes over the mob, organizing the Five Families, but as his power increases, so does interest from the Feds.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: "Lucky" Luciano decides to go into the prostitution business, but it gives Thomas Dewey the opportunity to arrest him and put him on trial.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: "Lucky" Luciano is found guilty of running a prostitution ring, and is imprisoned; Vito Genovese becomes acting boss.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: As World War II begins, Charles "Lucky" Luciano is asked to aid the military in the invasion of Sicily; Dewey considers allowing Luciano to fight.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: Luciano takes over Vito Genovese's heroin ring in Italy; Genovese and Gambino plot against mob leadership.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: Vito Genovese and Carlo Gambino make their move; when Genovese becomes a liability, Luciano must choose his successor.

programme.title: Butchers of L.A.
programme.desc: In the late 1960s and early 1970s, law enforcement discover a pattern of murdered hitchhikers and young men; their investigation lead them to an unassuming aerospace engineer, who lives a double life as a sadistic killer.

programme.title: Butchers of L.A.
programme.desc: In the late 1960s and early 1970s, law enforcement discover a pattern of murdered hitchhikers and young men; their investigation lead them to an unassuming aerospace engineer, who lives a double life as a sadistic killer.

programme.title: The Furry Detectives: Unmasking A Monster
programme.desc: When Patch O'Furr is tagged in a mysterious online post, he must face the fact that animal abusers are hiding in plain sight in the Furry Fandom; Furry Detectives comb through evidence and discover one popular Youtuber is a suspect.

programme.title: The Furry Detectives: Unmasking A Monster
programme.desc: When Patch O'Furr is tagged in a mysterious online post, he must face the fact that animal abusers are hiding in plain sight in the Furry Fandom; Furry Detectives comb through evidence and discover one popular Youtuber is a suspect.
